tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I m frm kashmir ,birthed a baby with foot deformities n limb discrepancy..aftr consulting him i found an angel with blessed hands ...treating my baby for 3yrs n now he is no more disable..he has given a new shape to my babies body n life..i m always indebted to him..n pray for his well being everytime i pray..babies like mine need him the most...none is like him..!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
On 18 th July I had taken my 19th month old son to show to Dr. Manoj Padman (paediatric orthopaedic). My son had a complaint of bow shaped leg .On physical examination he had confirmed that child looks normal and to confirm if everything is fine he had suggested few X-rays which we got it done right at that time and showed him the films of the X-ray on which he reconfirmed that X-rays are also normal by the time he turns two and half he should start walking normal and the bow should finish. Me and my family were happy with the positive answer and as per his suggestion we did not start any medication.  On 28th July I went to collect the written report from the  hospital in which it was mentioned suggestive of Rickets. Looking at the written report I couldn’t stay calm and I started contacted the doctor on 29th July however their was no response from his side till 2nd August . After 4 days when I again called the doctor, his assistant is telling me that doctor is now saying that we need to run some test and need to see the child again and he agreed that he had overlooked the X-ray flims and now he is also suggesting that it could be rickets . I am writing this review for the other family and kids to please think 100 times before approaching this doctor *** **** ***** ** *** ******** ** **** ***** *** ** **** **** * ******** * If I would have not collected the written report of my son and would have gone through Dr Padman words ** **** ***** *** **** ***** **** **** ** ***** ***** ***** ** ***** I am attaching the reports and the prescription ***** ******* ***** *** ** ***** ********* ** *** **********
On 2nd of August I had reported this issue to rainbow hospital which in return had connected me to Dr. Shivani (medical director ). After explaining her the entire scenario I was expecting that she would help me in taking some action against the doctor . However in return she started favouring Dr. Padman. I had put all my effort to save other parents by not putting their child in hands of this doctor but I failed because rainbow hospital instead of supporting their patients *** ********* ***** ***** ****** * Dr. Shivani on each call had only insisted me to come to hospital and meet the doctor and resolve the issue, she didn’t had any other solution for my problem but to only mutually solve it by meeting the doctor. * ******* *** *** **** ** ******* ******** **** ******* ** **** ** ********* *** ******* ******** *** *** ******** *** **** ******* * * **** ***** ** ****** ****** ** ******** * ** *** ***** ***** ** ******* ******** **** *** **** ****** ********* ****** **** ***** ** ********** ******** *** ***** ** ********** ******** *** **** **** ****** ** ***** **** ** *** ***** *** ****** ***** ******** ***** ** ******** ***** 

So please to all people who are reading this review do not consider taking consultation from Dr. Manoj padman .******** ** ***** ** ** ***** ******

Doctor is good, but Practo is not able book my appointment with the doctor. I have to meet doctor as walk-in patient. Moreover, fees shown on practo and what actually doctor charged is different. Practo showing less fees.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Padman is not only highly competitive but also a very nice human being. His diagnosis is par excellence and he customizes treatment basis individual needs of the patient. These qualities make him stand apart from other doctors,today.
I am disabled and have issues communicating.  Dr Manoj put me at ease and examined me privately..He examined me under a blanket so I felt comfortable. I think. Hw is one. of the best doctor.

Dr. Padman was patient and a great listener. He also provided very useful advices and explained our patient’s situation clearly and confidently. We highly advice him for pediatric orthopedic matters in Delhi.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Value for money,
review: The doctor was friendly, developed a rapport, and made a timely assessment. We were also seen on time and had little wait.
Rude and arrogant doctor. Stares at you all the time. Felt uncomfortable with his stare. Not able to communicate well in Hindi. English heavy accent.*** ** **********
